articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: iPhone 17 Pro Max review: Orange you glad the battery is bigger - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple’s iPhone 17 Pro lineup adds a sturdier unibody design, bigger battery, and camera upgrades, trading thinness for power, endurance, and creator appeal.
articles.content: When Apple announced its thin and light iPhone Air, some people said, “Who asked for a thinner phone?” Moments later, the company went in the other direction and announced a slightly thicker and bulk… [+6973 chars]
